p: The yearly incidence of HFRS correlated positively with rat density and rat's virus carriage rate. The average NDVI value increased year by year ( Fig. 5). javascript:;There was a negative correlation between average incidence and the average yearly NDVI value in cities of Hebei province ( r = −0.463, P<0.05). There was no significant correlation with mean temperature, inches of precipitation or number of days of sunshine.
